column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Friday June 7 at 7:00 a.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD / RUPTURED GAS MAIN:
column4: Outbound Tates Creek Rd is shutdown between Dove Run Rd and New Circle Rd due to a ruptured gas main.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD / RUPTURED GAS MAIN:
column4: All outbound traffic diverted to Dove Run Rd.
